title: Changing of the guard = Zmiana warty
brief_description: An animated fairy tale in which all of the characters - the soldier of the Royal Guard, the King’s daughter whom he loves, and all the King’s subjects are matchboxes which go up in flames because they have not learned the dangers of playing with fire.
